content: yarn r1 magic_ring of 6 single_crochet 6 r1 magic_ring of 8 single_crochet 8 r2 repeat *1sc 1inc* 3 times 9 r2 make 1sc for each stitch around 8 r3~r4 make 1sc for each stitch 9 r3 make 2sc 2dec 2sc 6 f/o r5 make 7sc 1dec 8 stuff lightly r6~r7 make 1sc for each stitch 8 stuff the tail… assembly r8 make 6sc 1dec 7 r9~r12 make 1sc for each stitch 7 stuff lightly… 1 attach ear to head f13 make 5sc 1dec 6 2 embroidery blue eyes with blue yarn between r14~r15 make 1sc for each stitch 6 f/o r9~11 about 9 stitches apart when sew to the body make sure to curve the tail 3 embroidery pink line just 1 row under eyes 4 embroidery black floss for mouth and you can use a little glue to make the little wave and let it dry thoroughly 5 attach head to body 6 attach both hands and feet to body 7 attach tail to the back of body make sure to sew the tail like a roll @copyright | all right reserved | dd s crochet by denise kao | http //ddscrochet pixnet net/blog
